mapper.sql: SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ISRECVWORK, t1.MEMO, t1.RECVINFORM, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.VALIDFLAG, t1.WFUSERID, t1.WFUSERNAME FROM T_SRFWFUSER t1

SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ISRECVWORK`, t1.`MEMO`, t1.`RECVINFORM`, t1.`RESERVER`, t1.`RESERVER2`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`VALIDFLAG`, t1.`WFUSERID`, t1.`WFUSERNAME` FROM `T_SRFWFUSER` t1
SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ISRECVWORK, t1.MEMO, t1.RECVINFORM, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.VALIDFLAG, t1.WFUSERID, t1.WFUSERNAME FROM T_WFUSER t1
SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ISRECVWORK, t1.MEMO, t1.RECVINFORM, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.VALIDFLAG, t1.WFUSERID, t1.WFUSERNAME FROM T_SRFWFUSER t1
SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ISRECVWORK, t1.MEMO, t1.RECVINFORM, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.VALIDFLAG, t1.WFUSERID, t1.WFUSERNAME FROM T_SRFWFUSER t1

SELECT t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[ISRECVWORK], t1.[MEMO], t1.[RECVINFORM], t1.[RESERVER], t1.[RESERVER2], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN], t1.[VALIDFLAG], t1.[WFUSERID], t1.[WFUSERNAME] FROM [T_SRFWFUSER] t1
